I'm currently shopping around for tools to translate HL7v2&CDA to FHIR.
I have identified FHIR-Converter by microsoft which is pretty good so far(but I'm afraid they are going to stop supporting the handlebars engine).
Any other recommendations?
You might ask on the #v2 to FHIR and #cda to fhir streams
you can use the FHIR Mapping language with the CDA Logical Model, we started with some base maps from CDA (not C-CDA) to FHIR here

Hello Everyone ,
I am new to CDA and trying to understand how the Encounter session entryRelationship -> Observation are related to particular Encounter ?
While transforming CDA to FHIR ,how to identify which one is DD(Discharge diagnosis) or CC(Chief complaint) and is it Observation or Condition ?

Hello Kajal, there is a #CDA stream where you can ask questions related to CDA. For CDA to FHIR, there is also a corresponding stream (#cda to fhir. FHIR specific questions can be asked in this stream.
